Name: Red Earl (by Salvatore Calabrese)
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix) optional
Instructions: MUDDLE ginger and then raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Fresh ginger adds a hint of spice which combines well with raspberry fruit in this crowd-pleasing vodka-based cocktail which is freshened by a dash of limoncello.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Salvatore Calabrese – I added half a spoon of sugar to his recipe which you may or not need depending on your raspberries and limoncello.
